name: Warg
description: A warg is usually a hermit or cultist who—over many years—has cultivated the ability to transform at will into a certain animal. Unlike a druid, who can transform into a number of small animals, a warg can only transform into one type of animal. But what a warg sacrifices in flexibilty, they gain in power. Wargs usually transform into large animals, such as a direwolf, rune bear, or even the mighty rhinoceros.
backstoryPrompts: Why did you choose to learn to transform into your specific animal?
Have you always had a close connection to nature, or did something spur that connection?
What was your first transformation like?
What made you give up your previous life and start adventuring?
coreAbilityDescription: You expend 6 ability points to transform into your chosen animal, for up to one hour.
